This code system http://bw.health.gov/fhir/ImplementationGuide/bw-amr-ig/CodeSystem/botswana-amr-local-method-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
vitek Vitek automated systembioMérieux Vitek automated identification and susceptibility testing system

manual Manual biochemical testingTraditional manual biochemical identification methods
